item.title: My First Post
item.description: Youâ€™ll find this post in your content/posts directory. To add new posts, simply add a file in the content/posts directory that follows the convention name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea of how it works. Hugo also offers powerful support for code snippets: Check out the Hugo docs for more info on how to get the most out of Hugo.
